topic.title: Unit Left Scene Time - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10855)/@code="69475-2" Unit left scene time (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10854)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS (CONF:10856)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.09
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10855)/@code="69475-2" Unit left scene time (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10854)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS (CONF:10856)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.09

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1129781699"/> <code code="69475-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Unit left scene time"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="TS"/> </observation>
